L7p:Comment.stringValue: *** Rest Service that responds to 4 different request.
*** Service accepts any of the above urls and parses the query for the request to formulate the response

L7p:value.stringValue: Destination and straing point are the same

L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse.L7p:Content: <voonairreservationDetailsResponse> <voonairreservationResult> <Destination>${source[1]}</Destination> <startingpoint>${source[0]}</startingpoint> <Error>Invalid Request for the Destination and or starting point</Error> </voonairreservationResult> </voonairreservationDetailsResponse>

L7p:value.stringValue: Destination and straing point are the same
